description:
Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

SBet was established in 1997 in Montenegro as a company that specialized in sports betting. During last 20 years, we have become a leader in providing betting services in Montenegro. Currently we have more than 100 betting shops, where you can find wide offer on many sports with atractive odds.

The policy of our company is based on modern business principles. We continuously improve our services and our ultimate goal is to successfully anticipate  our customers needs and maintain our clients satisfaction. Apart from our core business we also have our own production and offer of high-quality betting odds for various sports. At the same time, as a support for organizing sports betting we have developed an IT system that produces, maintains and upgrades the software.

We continuously invest in expanding and fortifying our betting shop network in contemporary furnished premises. We constantly develop and improve our business and it is motivating our employees to constantly improve themselves. Our greatest capital is our employees, who are highly qualified personnel, capable of making well advised and right decisions, which is the key of successful business. Taking care of needs and concern for the progress of every individual working in SBbet, the company help its employees to improve their skills and knowledge through individual and group based activities such as seminars, education etc.

Professional staff, implementation of worldwide experience and knowledge, along with modern way of organizing business create necessary conditions for achieving results that lead to sustainable longevity of our company.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League

• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Dobrodošli na najmoderniju MaxBet aplikaciju. Iskoristite bonus dobrodošlice i isprobajte sportsko klađenje uživo, slot igre i virtuelno klađenje na najvišem nivou.

Preuzmite MaxBet aplikaciju za vaše iOS uređaje jer vas od sada na jednom mjestu očekuju brojne pogodnosti kojim kuća časti sve one koji žele više. Ova aplikacija kreirana je tako da funkcioniše brzo i omogućava vam jednostavno klađenje uživo i lako kretanje kroz različite opcije. Bilo da tražite virtuelno klađenje, slot igre ili najbolju ponudu za klađenje na sport, jednostavno ćete doći do cilja. Sve je dizajnirano tako da u fokusu budu različite igre i najbolje korisničko iskustvo za sve vas koji znate na koji način ćete da iskoristite bonus dobrodošlice.

Sportsko klađenje

Sportsko klađenje je sada brže, lakše i jednostavnije. Bez obzira na to da li više volite klađenje uživo ili su vaše omiljene igre iz prematch ponude, MaxBet aplikacija vam omogućava sve na jednom mjestu. Izaberite omiljeni sport i igre u koje se najviše uzdate i započnite vašu avanturu ka velikom dobitku.

Max bonus dobrodošlice

Registrujte se na MaxBet aplikaciji i iskoristite Max bonus dobrodošlice kao i sve pogodnosti kojim kuća časti nove igrače. Započnite sportsko klađenje ili zavrtite omiljene slot igre sa još većim šansama za dobitak. Bonus dobrodošlice očekuje vas u gotovo svakom trenutku i nudi pogodnosti zbog kojih će MaxBet (p)ostati vaša omiljena kladionica.

Virtuelno klađenje

Isprobajte virtuelno klađenje i online igre koje su sve popularnije širom svijeta. Aviator, trke pasa, raznolike igre na brojeve, virtuelni sportovi i još mnogo uzbuđenja. Virtuelno klađenje sa odličnom ponudom čeka vas na MaxBet aplikaciji u svakom trenutku.

Slot igre

MaxBet aplikacija je najbolje mjesto na kome možete zaigrati slot igre. Na samo par klikova od vas pronaći ćete na desetine najboljih svjetskih provajdera među kojima su: Pragmatic Play, Amusnet, Novomatic, Synot, Playson, Fazi, Evolution i mnogi drugi.

Kada su u pitanju slot igre neke od najatraktivnijih koje vas čekaju na MaxBet aplikaciji jesu Sweet Bonanza, 40 Super Hot, Book of Ra, Respin Joker, Gates of Olympus,... Ukoliko spadate u one koji više vole slot igre nego klađenje, odlična vijest za vas je i činjenica da MaxBet jackpot svakog trenutka može pasti i promijeniti vam život.

Klađenje uživo

Klađenje uživo je još jedna funkcionalnost po kojoj se MaxBet aplikacija izdvaja. Znamo koliko je brzina bitna za sve vas kojima je klađenje uživo strast. Iz tog razloga smo kreirali aplikaciju koja klađenje uživo dodatno pojednostavljuje i omogućava vam da lako pronađete željeni sport, odnosno igre koje tražite.

Dodatne funkcionalnosti

MaxBet aplikacija osmišljena je prema potrebama ljudi koji sportsko klađenje uživo, slot igre, virtuelne igre i sport generalno vide kao strast i zabavu. Cilj nam je bio ne samo da prenesemo vrhunsku ponudu iz naših lokala, već da vam približimo sve igre na još većem nivou.

Uz MaxBet aplikaciju klađenje će za vas postati još veće uživanje jer ćete sa lakoćom pratiti svoje opklade, pregledati istoriju, upravljati svojim sredstvima. Za sva pitanja, na raspolaganju vam stoji naš tim stručnjaka koji će vam pružiti potrebnu podršku i odgovoriti na sva vaša pitanja.

Život je igra – igrajte odgovorno

MaxBet aplikacija je namijenjena isključivo punoljetnim osobama. Preuzmite aplikaciju što prije, iskoristite bonus dobrodošlice i započnite klađenje uživo ili druge igre koje će vam donijeti uzbuđenje i šansu za nevjerovatnim dobitcima.

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Easy Tournament is a website and app to organize championships, leagues and tournaments. Post the results, leaderboard, photos, videos and news so that everyone can follow your championship.

With the app you also have rankings of players, you can create polls and votes, attach documents, print scoresheets and tables, share images of the results, open for registrations and many other features.

SPORT AND MODALITIES
Manage tournaments of different sports and eSports

SOCCER
FUTSAL
HANDBALL
BASKETBALL
VOLLEYBALL
TENNIS
TABLE TENNIS (PING PONG)
MOBA (LOL, DOTA)
BATTLE ROYALE (FORTNITE, FREE FIRE, CALL OF DUTY)
SHOOT GAMES
ONLINE FOOTBALL (PES, FIFA)
And several other options for you to create the tournament you want.

TYPES OF CHAMPIONSHIPS
You can easily create round-robin tournaments , knockouts, groups, or a combination of whatever you want. It is also possible to create championships with several categories, great for school games or championships with age divisions or separated by male / female.

COMPLETE SYSTEM
With the app you can add moderators to help you edit the championship, send team registration links, add sponsor banners, team logos and player photos, share on social networks and much more.

If you have any questions please contact us the way you prefer and we will help you as soon as possible.

Download now and start using the best tournament manager.

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

JudoTV - Never miss a throw!

Welcome to JudoTV, the official streaming and video on demand platform of the International Judo Federation! Whether you’re a professional judoka, the biggest fan or just stepping onto the tatami, we’ve got you covered. Here’s what our app offers:

Live Competitions: Follow all the Judo events including the  WJT (World Judo Tour) streams right on your device. From Antalya to Tokyo, witness every throw and victory.

Expert Commentary: Get insights from our judo experts. Learn about techniques, strategies, and the values of Judo.

Thriving Community: Join our global community of judo enthusiasts. Share your passion, connect with fellow judokas, join the Prediction League and stay updated on the latest events.

Unlimited Rewatch: Dive into our extensive archive of contests from major judo competitions. Study specific techniques, analyze strategies, and relive those epic moments. It’s like having a dojo at your fingertips!

Watch in Full HD: Enjoy ad-free streaming with the option to watch contests on the full

Ready to step up your Judo game? Download JudoTV now and follow the action live!

Download JudoTV

Terms of use: https://www.ijf.org/page/terms_of_use-en
Privacy policy: https://www.ijf.org/page/privacy-en

Welcome to Sparring Zone: Your Gateway to Martial Excellence

Are you ready to take on the challenge and level up in the world of martial arts? With Sparring Zone, you now have a platform that offers an unparalleled training experience, helps you find competitive sparring partners, and discover local talents who share your passion.

Discover the Martial Way: Sparring Zone is more than just an app. It's your ally on the path to martial excellence. We understand that every martial artist, from beginners to experts, is constantly seeking ways to improve, push their limits, and become the best fighter they can be. In that spirit, we've created Sparring Zone.

Plan, Train, Elevate Your Game: Our platform simplifies the process of finding competitive sparring partners. Whether you're a passionate MMA fighter, a boxing, kickboxing, judo, karate enthusiast, or practice any other martial art, Sparring Zone is designed to meet your needs. Create sparring sessions in no time, find partners matched to your level and style, and refine your skills through high-intensity training sessions.

Push Your Boundaries with Sparring Zone: We firmly believe that sparring training is the ultimate way to test your skills, improve your technique, and enhance your fitness. Sparring Zone is here to help you achieve all of that. You can record your sessions, track your performance, and receive guidance from our martial arts experts.

Join the Community of Enthusiasts: Martial training is more than just physical activity; it's a community of passionate individuals with shared goals. With Sparring Zone, you gain access to a dynamic and committed community of like-minded fighters. Share your experiences, challenge each other, and find inspiration for your own journey.

Passion, Determination, Excellence: At Sparring Zone, we believe in the power of determination and hard work. We believe that every martial artist has the potential to become a champion, whether it's a champion in everyday life, a seasoned competitor, or a professional athlete.

Ready for the Challenge? Enter Sparring Zone today and discover how we can help you reach new heights in martial arts. Join a community of passionate fighters who share your vision of martial excellence.

Download the Sparring Zone app and transform your training. The path to excellence awaits.

Reloading is an enjoyable and rewarding hobby that is easily conducted with safety. The essence of reloading safety is proper handling and storage of primers and powders. As important is strict following of the instructions given by the manufacturers of the reloading equipment as well as the reloading components. Attention paid to detail and patience ensures safety and quality.

Vihtavuori Reload is application to help you with reloading process as well as to keep track on your reloading recipes. You can easily manage your current recipes as well as create new ones. Print out your recipes by sending those to your e-mail. 

Create recipes to as many weapons and calibres you want. Everything stays in order in Vihtavuori Reload.

With Vihtavuori Reload you have easy access to latest Vihtavuori Reloading Data as well as other Vihtavuori information.


For over 90 years, Vihtavuori has been known for producing high quality propellant with reliable ballistic performance, long shelf-Life and wide variety selection. All of our powders meet the strict requirements of both civilian and military needs

Sierra Bullets Reloading Manual V6.0 of Rifle and Handgun Reloading Data.

The development of this reloading manual app has brought exciting, new changes. Many new Sierra bullets have been added, with new cartridge types and powders. Sierra built its own Pressure Testing Lab to quantify the new loading data found within the app.


App features include:
Reloading powder weight calculator for all the cartridges found in Sierra Bullet's paper manual. 
History about most included cartridges.
Bullet details for all of Sierra Bullet's current and many older bullets.
Exterior Ballistic paper.
Technical contact information.
Answers to Frequently asked questions about reloading.
Firearm care and maintenance information.
Ability to view in dark or light mode for easy reading.

The free version has a reduced amount of data so users may see a sample of how the program operates. A subscription in-app purchase includes more text for key sections of the app including The Bullets section, The Reloading Section, and the Ballistics section.  
The most important feature a subscription adds is the full set of current cartridge data for hundreds of cartridges. 

Sierra Bullets LLC is constantly adding more data as new bullets are developed, the app will be updated as new data is available. Sierra Bullets has been producing hard cover manuals for over 50 years but using an app allows more functionality for the user.

Don't forget to turn on Notifications

Athletes

BRAVE Gyms
Training the mind, body and spirit. BRAVE gym offers state of the art equipment and traditional fitness options to personnel training. A full range of youth and group fitness programs and MMA instructions in the BRAVE cage. 
 
BRAVE Combat Federation has been on a mission to showcase young and experienced Martial Arts talent on a global stage, to tell the story of their struggle, hardship and their journey to becoming the greatest of all time. 
 
With over 92+ events across 35 countries in a short span of under 6 years, BRAVE CF seeks  the best talents from around the world and offers them a global platform to not only showcase their skills but also to represent their country on a superior level.
 
BRAVE CF TV also features training videos from international MMA talent that create an aspiration for upcoming talent to train hard and aim towards glory at the end of the tunnel, a way of bringing international MMA fighting near you.

Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.
• Features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

◉SEASON 25/26 KICK OFF!◉
Get your team ready for the season start and sign the new LALIGA players. Transfer market updates are already included so you can build your team and beat your friends.

Prepare your football team every matchday with players like Mbappé, Lamine Yamal, Nico Williams, or Julián Álvarez and become the best Fantasy football manager.
Are you ready to enjoy the authentic experience of being a football manager? Choose your football lineup, have fun with tons of features, score like never before, and lead your team to glory! Win great prizes every matchday in special events!

Compete in DAZN's El Partidazo Fantasy against other users in unique live matches and special events like ELCLÁSICO (Real Madrid vs. FC Barcelona), ELDERBIDEMADRID (Real Madrid vs. Atlético de Madrid), ELGRANDERBI (Sevilla FC vs. Real Betis), or ELDERBIVASCO (Real Sociedad vs Athletic). A different major match and a new event every matchday! By activating the option, a single-matchday championship will be created, and you can build your starting XI by combining players from the event teams. Feel like a true Fantasy coach with one of the most outstanding sports games!

◉ PREMIUM FEATURES ◉
▶ Captain: Name a player captain, and they will score double points for the matchday.
▶ Bench: Add players to the bench, and if a player in your lineup doesn't score points, players from the bench will.
▶ Football Coach: You can sign coaches for your squad and perform the same operations as with players, and they will also score points for you on the matchday.
▶ Formations and Lineups: Enjoy additional playing systems or football lineups.
▶ Loans: Loan out or receive a loan of any player in your Fantasy League.
▶ Ideal XI Bonus: Get more money to manage your team and squad for each player who makes it into FANTASY's Ideal XI.

◉ LEAGUE CUSTOMIZER - OPTIONAL BUYOUT CLAUSE ◉

You can sign a player from a rival football team by paying their release clause. Users in private Fantasy leagues can enable or disable this option as they see fit.

◉ NEW FEATURE: SHIELD ◉
You will have the ability to protect one player per matchday to prevent another manager from activating their buyout clause on them or signing them for their team.

◉ LALIGA FANTASY ◉

Refresh your football team every matchday: LALIGA FANTASY is the only official football manager game, with standings, live match scores, and points based on official LALIGA results and statistics.

Conquer LALIGA and become the best Fantasy football coach!

Play in Public League Divisions: Public Leagues feature divisions that you'll access based on your performance last season, and if you're a new user, you'll start from the lowest division and can advance based on your results.

◉ True Stats Live Scoring: ◉

Player scoring works based on real statistics. Follow live matches while having fun with the only official LALIGA Fantasy football game!

What are you waiting for to create a league with your friends? Manage your club by signing LALIGA's top players... And show who the best football manager is!

◉How LALIGA FANTASY 2025/26 works:◉

1. Register in the app, get a 14-player team and a 100 million budget for signings.
2. Manage your lineup, formations, and playing systems. Adjust your tactics and football lineups until you find your ideal XI.
3. Bid for football players in the transfer market or activate buyout clauses on your friends' players to become the best coach.
4. Invite friends and compete with them in Fantasy Leagues.

Join the Fantasy family and enjoy the best football game as a coach!

SportsID is your personal mobile partner in the world of sports.

With sports events, exclusive content, fast-breaking news, more than 10.000 events per year and over 5 million athletes and participants worldwide, you're never without something amazing to explore. Watch and follow your favourite athlete, compare yourself or others in the official rankings, and get detailed results of all sports events, tournaments, competitions and e-tournaments from around the world.

Featuring exclusive data from sportdata.org including the following sports types:
• Karate
• Kickboxing
• Ju-Jitsu
• Mixed Martial Arts
...and many more!

*** Top 3 Reasons to Download the SportsID App ***

1. NEVER MISS A SPORTS EVENT
Get sport news and latest announcements from sport events, tournaments, competitions and e-tournaments around the world. Get all information and sport data needed for participating or following a sports event, grab details about the registration, and get tips and quick links for preparing to participate in the event (tickets, hotels, flights and weather forecasts). Quickly find live matches, downloads, photos provided by the event and current live streams. See participating clubs and countries as well as all individual athletes and participants worldwide take will be compete in the event. Follow ongoing events and check back later for event results and videos.

2. FOLLOW YOUR FAVORITE ATHLETES
Are you interested in other athletes and want to get the latest results, event participations and recorded videos of the tournaments or do you want to follow your own athlete profile? Either way, you will get exclusive athlete profile data including the global ranking, past and future events, all individual ranking results of events and tournaments, and a map showing all event locations the athlete has been to. Following the achievements of others has never been easier!

3. GET THE LATEST RANKINGS
The SportsID app features detailed rankings from sportdata.org, separated by categories. Analyse the scores of athletes and enjoy watching improvements of yourself or others in the global rankings.

SportsID offers the largest and most diverse sports information worldwide. Including comprehensive coverage and latest news from more than 10.000 events per year and over 5 million athletes and participants from 240 countries worldwide and featuring exclusive data from sportdata.org, you can easily find what you are looking for.

So join the worldwide sports community and get moving with SportsID today!

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.
